title: Milky Way Repo
description: Nathan Teller owns Milky Way Repossessions, a company that tracks down and repossesses starships. Obsessed with his ex-wife and drowning in debt, Nathan and his crew receive a job offer to deliver the ransom for a starship crew being held hostage by a cult. They soon find themselves at the mercy of scam artists, surrounded by slacker cultists, and pursued by a self-immolating loan shark hell bent on collecting a gambling debt.
author: Michael Prelee
